Yes, I know. that's what I have do. But let's face it, that doesn't make any sense.

In KSP1 I change the default keyboard controls to remove the secondary SAS buttons {JKLI} and I think {HN}. Thus, I can use the default WASD if I want SAS, and I can use IJKL if I only want to control wheels. I think KSP2 has the same control interface but I would have to load up the game to double check.
